segments.text: Um , which of them is the better typist ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Mary types faster than Jones . But I think Jones types more carefully .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any difference in their short hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jones can certainly take down letter more quickly , but Mary ’ s short hand is the best in her class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Both of them speak excellent French . But I think Mary speaks German more fluently than Jones does .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um . That doesn ’ t really matter . Because we have more French visitors than German .
segments.speaker: S1
